global encoding.from sentence: To tackle this problem , we propose a model of global encoding for abstractive summarization .

set.from sentence: We set a convolutional gated unit to perform global encoding on the source context .

has.from sentence: The gate based on convolutional neural network ( CNN ) filters each encoder output based on the global context due to the parameter sharing , so that the representations at each time step are refined with consideration of the global context .
